mapper.sql: ID, PRO_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, REMARKS, FILE_NAME, PATH, GEN_TYPE, TEMP_LANGUAGE, SORTS, CAN_DEL, CONTENTS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG

insert into gen_pro_templates()
select #{item.id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.proId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.templateName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fileName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.path, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.genType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.tempLanguage, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.sorts, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{item.canDel, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{item.contents, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate, jdbcType = DATE}, #{item.updateBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate, jdbcType = DATE}, #{item.delFlag, jdbcType = DATE} from dual
